basics.name: Ibai Guillén Pacho
basics.label: PhD Candidate
basics.summary: PhD candidate focused in the knowledge temporal evolution.

work.name: Ontology Engineering Group, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid
work.summary: Use of natural language processing techniques and language models. Facilitating the temporal analysis of document collections based on the combination of probabilistic models with knowledge representation techniques.

work.name: Ontology Engineering Group, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid
work.summary: Use of natural language processing techniques and language models. Development and study of COVID-19 scientific article topics. Analysis of the evolution over time of the use of drugs in the treatment of SARS-CoV-19.

work.name: Everis (now NTT Data)
work.summary: Integration and migration of services to Azure cloud infrastructures. Resolution of front-end incidents. Development of APIs and documentation.

work.name: DeustoTech, University of Deusto
work.summary: Development of a platform for auditing open data on blockchain. Development of smart-contracts on the Ethereum network. Development of a plugin for the CKAN platform.

education.institution: Universidad Politécnica de Madrid, Madrid, Spain
Universidad Politécnica de Madrid, Madrid, Spain

education.studyType: Bsc in Computer Engineering + Business Digital Transformation

awards.title: Ayuda para la contratación de personal investigador predoctoral en formación
awards.awarder: Consejería de Educación, Ciencia y Universidades de la Comunidad de Madrid, Spain
awards.summary: The purpose of these grants is to contract pre-doctoral research staff in formation for the completion of doctoral theses with the characteristics described in the International Doctorate.
